alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 17 at 8:34PM CST until February 18 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Illinois, including the following areas, Grundy and Southern Will counties. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...If an ice jam occurs, localized flooding is possible where the jam occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Emergency management reported ice from a previous ice jam has shifted downstream. Although no ice jam flooding is imminent, future ice jams are possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
